sales.name: Step into Spring with Pediped Shoes
Top Easter Dresses: Kayce Hughes & More
Trumpette Socks & Apparel
sales.description: When it comes to adorable baby socks, Trumpette has the market cornered. Don’t miss this selection of creative, colorful styles for boys and girls, including high-top socks and sweet Mary Jane booties. Packed in cutesy egg crates and sparkly keepsake boxes, the wrapping is half the fun.

sales.name: Easter Styles by Simonetta & Sonia Rykiel
sales.description: Easter clothes are the cutest, and we've got a big selection to choose from. Dress your little girl in a darling print dress — or maybe a colorful top-and-skirt combo will suit her personality better. Our favorite look: Sonia Rykiel's cherry-print dress. The red-and-pink color combo definitely pops. Girly girls will love it!

sales.name: Omaha Steaks
sales.description: Up to 50% off! This is the perfect chance to stock up on gourmet steaks.

sales.name: Joyfolie's Egg-ceptional Shoes
sales.description: These charming shoes will make you melt! We've seen it all — and shoes don't get much cuter than this. The colorful footwear is adorned with flowers and bows — perfect for Easter dress-up.

sales.name: Kids' Letter Charms by Amelia Rose
sales.description: One cool way to make your kids stand out: Adorn them with one of Amelia Rose’s beautiful initial charm necklaces this Easter (you can get one for yourself, too!). Each features a bold letter embossed in gold on a dainty matching chain, and all the letters of the alphabet are represented, so whether you’ve got an Ava or a Zahara, you’re good to go.

sales.name: Zac Posen
sales.description: We love how effortlessly Hollywood favorite Zac Posen masters the intricate details in his sophisticated designs — and the end of a season is a great occasion to snag some Posen. There's lots to love in this selection, which is full of dramatic floor-length gowns, silk frocks rendered in striking hues and intriguing silhouettes, elegant separates, and plenty LBDs that you'll wear forever.

sales.name: The Coffee & Tea Event
sales.description: Sip those winter blues away—and get fully caffeinated while you’re at it— with our coffee and tea event. Shop for high-tech brewers, classic presses, kettles, frothers, mugs, and more, from your favorite brands like Bodum, Cuisinart, and Emile Henry.

sales.name: Pippa & Julie Easter Dresses
sales.description: Temperatures are beginning to rise, and it's almost time to dress up your little girl for Easter. These adorable pastel dresses with bow and ruffle embellishments are sweet-as-can-be and utterly irresistible. Our favorite: The white dot dress with the silk pink bow!

sales.name: "Sunday Best" for Boys
sales.description: Let your little man make his Easter debut in his "Sunday Best!" Pair adorable button-downs and vests with blazers and khakis for a comfy combo that will take your tot from Easter morning to egg hunt.

sales.name: The Perfect Easter Basket
sales.description: Don't stress about finding the perfect Easter gifts for your little one — we've going everything right here! From plush toys and dolls to jewelry and books, your cutie will be one happy kid on Easter morning.

sales.name: Kids' Rain Boots & Umbrellas by Däv
sales.description: Spring showers are on their way, but this colorful rain gear will keep kids' spirits up on the darkest days. The boots come in playful kid-friendly patterns (our favorite: the pink-and-red cowboy print), and boast unexpected details like sneaker-style laces. Matching umbrellas round out this cute, weatherproof assortment.

sales.name: D.L. & Co. Candles & Diffusers
sales.description: Scent seduces — something apparent by this collection of swank diffusers and soy-based candles. Set the mood with a 10-sided diffuser in a scent called Lady Rhubarb, a citrusy mix of blood orange, red mandarin, grapefruit, and sandalwood. Or welcome spring by opting for one of the beautifully presented candles in refreshingly fruity notes like apple and pear.

sales.name: Bouton Kids' Apparel: Hand-Woven Fabrics
sales.description: This limited-edition line features unique, beautiful prints. The clothes are made with hand-woven textiles, and the designs feature influences from all over the world, including Bombay, Boston, Washington, New York, Paris, and London. The dresses, button-downs, and other pieces in this sale are works of art.

sales.name: New Style! Image Canvas Photo Art
sales.description: Make your photos a work of art! It's easy: Image Canvas will display your fondest memories on art-quality canvas, so you can hang them up for all to see. You can edit and crop the photos yourself, and they'll arrive ready-to-hang. Talk about picture perfect.

sales.name: Mehraban One-of-a-Kind Rugs
sales.description: A rug can make or break a room. And you can make any space look effortlessly cool by laying down one of these vintage, tribal, or contemporary designs from Morocco, Turkey, and beyond. Each rug looks unique — as though you had picked it up at a flea market in Paris or at a souk in Marrakech.

sales.name: Baby Boutique
sales.description: Parents, meet your secret weapon: From naptime to mealtime to playtime — and any other time you can think of — this sale has you covered. Baby bedding, clothes, toys, and diaper bags are just some of the must-haves you'll find in this array from our favorite baby brands.

sales.name: The Boys' Shop
sales.description: Rough-and-tumble boys can wear out their clothes quickly, and the Gilt Baby & Kids team kept that in mind when choosing this stylish selection. Everything in this sale can stand up to the ultimate level of wear and tear!

sales.name: The Girls' Shop
sales.description: From dresses to sandals, this sale is packed with some of our favorite looks for little girls. And since this bunch includes both versatile neutrals and playful brights, she'll have plenty to choose from no matter her style.

sales.name: Cold-Weather Accessories Blowout: Up to 75% Off
sales.description: Hats, gloves, and scarves. It’s just three little things, but try making your way through the colder months without 'em. This sale's got a massive selection of indispensable accouterments — in everything from leather to wool to cashmere — so you can stay warm in style until the spring thaw sets in.

sales.name: The Toy Shop
sales.description: Toys can take your tot's IQ to new levels, so it's important to keep plenty of them on hand. This sale includes brands that we have the utmost respect for — and we know these products will pump up the fun factor in your home.

sales.name: Tommy Hilfiger Boys' Apparel
sales.description: All-American. Preppy. Effortless. These things are synonymous with iconic brand Tommy Hilfiger, and this collection of boy’s separates embraces the energy of the label — bold stripes and rugged materials included. Think flannel shirts, chino pants, and button-downs that'll give your kid preppy-chic appeal.
